de.bioforscher.singa.simulation.model.graphs

Class AutomatonNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bioforscher.singa.mathematics.graphs.model.AbstractNode<AutomatonNode,Vector2D,RectangularCoordinate>
      • de.bioforscher.singa.simulation.model.graphs.AutomatonNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Node<AutomatonNode,Vector2D,RectangularCoordinate>

    public class AutomatonNode
extends AbstractNode<AutomatonNode,Vector2D,RectangularCoordinate>
    A node of the AutomatonGraph. Contains the NodeState, the concentrations of ChemicalEntitys in a ConcentrationContainer, the CellSection, and amongst other attributes. Each node holds references to its neighbour nodes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AutomatonNode(int column, int row) 
      AutomatonNode(RectangularCoordinate identifier)
      Creates a new plain automaton node.

      • AutomatonNode

        public AutomatonNode(RectangularCoordinate identifier)
        Creates a new plain automaton node. Initialized as NodeState.AQUEOUS in a "default" compartment with a SimpleConcentrationContainer.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier of the node.
